I listen to chill music while I read my children's books and play with my toys.
i do not have many friends.
i do not like the song sweet home alabama.

content.text: What do you like to do in your free time?
I love hiking with my friends and listening to chill music.
That sounds fun. I love to go hiking too.
What's your favorite part about it?
I like being outdoors and being active. I also like the challenge of hiking up hills.
I like the scenery and the fresh air.
Me too. Do you have any favorite hiking spots?
I like to go hiking in the mountains. I think the views are the best there.
I agree. I love the views from the top of mountains.
Have you ever been hiking in the Grand Canyon?
No, I haven't. I've always wanted to go though.
It's a beautiful place. You should definitely go sometime.
I will definitely try to go sometime.
Good. I'm sure you'll love it.
